meta.name: Automate Cryptocurrency Analysis & Reports with Google Gemini and CoinGecko Email Alerts

name: Automatic Cryptocurrency Analysis and Reporting with Google Gemini and CoinGecko

parameters.content:
Hello,

This workflow is an automated system that fetches market data for your specified cryptocurrencies from the CoinGecko API, generates a professional analysis text based on this data, and then sends this analysis to you via email.

Workflow Purpose:

Runs automatically every day at 10:00 AM.

Retrieves real-time data for cryptocurrencies like BONK, PEPE, Radio Caca, and Stellar.

Analyzes this data using an AI model.

Sends the generated analysis via email to your specified address.

How to Customize:

Change Cryptocurrency: To change the cryptocurrencies you want to analyze, you can edit the ids= part in the URL of each "HTTP Request" node. For example, you can change ids=bonk to ids=bitcoin to fetch Bitcoin data.

Example: In the URL https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=try&ids=bonk..., replace bonk with the id of the coin you want.

Tip: If you want to get analysis for more cryptocurrencies, you can expand your workflow by simply copying and pasting the existing groups of HTTP Request, Code, Basic LLM Chain, and Send a message nodes.

Change AI Prompt: If you want to change the content and language of the analysis text, you can edit the prompt text in the "AI Promp" node that is connected to the "Basic LLM Chain" node. This allows you to completely adapt the analysis text to your own needs.

Change AI Model: The Google Gemini Chat Model is used by default. If you prefer to use a different AI model, you can delete the "Google Gemini Chat Model" node and add another n8n AI model like ChatGPT, Deepseek, or Ollama in its place.

Change Email Address: To change the email address where the analyses are sent, you can update the "To" and "Bcc" fields in the "Send a message" nodes with your own email addresses.

Note: Since no API keys or sensitive information are used, this is a shareable template. You can use it with confidence.
